definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Chinese Exclusion Act, a US law restricting Chinese immigration from 1882-1943

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州長先生，感謝你在這項法案上起到的領導作用。

sentences.english: But Mr. Viniar declined to discuss in detail the impact that the new regulations would have on Goldman, saying that it was too early to give any guidance on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 關於新法案對高盛的影響，維尼亞拒絕詳細置評。

sentences.english: The Chinese Exclusion Act was repealed only in 1943.
sentences.chinese: 直到1943年排華法案才被取消。

sentences.english: The pro-slavery legislature passed a bill calling for such a convention.
sentences.chinese: 支持奴隸制的立法會通過了要求召開制憲會議的法案。

sentences.english: America has legitimate beefs with China, but this bill is the wrong way to address them.
sentences.chinese: 美國這麼做有它的道理，但此法案卻並不能解決問題。

sentences.english: House and Senate conferees have struck a deal on the new farm bill.
sentences.chinese: 參衆兩院與會代表已就新的農業法案達成協議。

sentences.english: The bill, which has 31 co-sponsors, has been forwarded to the House Ways and Means Committee for consideration.
sentences.chinese: 這項法案已提交衆議院籌款委員會審議。

sentences.english: In particular, the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is vital to the community's mission against terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 尤其外國信息監督法案對於智囊團反恐任務至關重要。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency does not regulate manganese under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
sentences.chinese: 環境保護機構沒有按照安全飲用水法案規範錳的含量。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, this chapter also conducted a detailed analysis the contents of the various parts of the bill.
sentences.chinese: 同時該章還對法案各部分內容進行了詳細的分析。

sentences.english: Even geekier than Bill of Rights Golf.
sentences.chinese: 比高爾夫權利法案更瘋狂。

sentences.english: Most of these were acquired under the delightfully Guano Island Act. when the U.
sentences.chinese: 大多數島嶼都是由於“鳥糞島法案”而獲得的。

sentences.english: The bill also includes one-year extension of tax credits of ethanol industry policy .
sentences.chinese: 該法案也包括將乙醇行業的稅收抵減政策延期一年。

sentences.english: The number of states passing immigration-related bills has skyrocketed this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年通過移民法案的州的數量顯著增加。

sentences.english: The goal seems to be to defend the royal family from criticism.
sentences.chinese: 該法案的目的似乎是保衛王室，使之免於批評。

sentences.english: The Health Bill proposes to restrict cigarette-vending machines in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 健康法案建議限制酒吧中的自動售煙機。
